text:
Cheapest food and drinks I can find around the area.

Economic rice is always wide selection and tasted good. Price increased this year (2024) but still cheap.

Drinks are nicely done too specially their hot milo.

Can try mee poh as noodles are very springy and nicely done. Laksa not too bad but not the best. Soup a little watery kind but taste is maintain. Generous in their ingredients too. Worth the price still.
Packed lunch back. Lady fingers, French beans and steam egg with minced meat and rice cost $4.20.

Affordable Food Court With A Neighbourhood Feel!  Simple food court offerings like Cai Fan and Minced Meat Noodles that are tasty and affordable. Lots of Cai Fan choices and serving is quite generous considering its close proximity to the shopping belt Orchard.  Dining area is clean and service is fuss free.

A decent early morning coffee house that helps to serve the standard breakfast noodles and to aid your coffee fix. Place is very standard with plastic chairs and tables. Not meant to hang around for too long..

A little diner in Singapore Shopping Centre serving all day meal from breakfast to dinner. Very affordable price and delicious food. They have chap chai b'ng, bak chor mee fishball noodle, sliced fish noodle and bao and hot and cold drinks. Friendly and helpful staff. I come here every so often while waiting for my mom getting acupuncture treatment at the Hui Sheng TCM Clinic a few shops away.
